<div class="c_DNN6 c_DNN6_Header">
	<div id="dnn_ctr14266_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_14266 --><div id="dnn_ctr14266_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">

		<div id="hometext">
<h1>Welcome to Curry's Auto Service... Proudly Serving Northern Virginia, DC, and Maryland!</h1>
<p><a href="http://www.currysauto.com/shop-for-tires/tire-brands.aspx"><img src="/portals/99/Skins/master/img/vlb.jpg" alt="Shop For Tires" style="float: right; margin: 0px 0px 0px 10px;" /></a></p>
<p><a href="http://www.currysauto.com/services/the-curry-experience.aspx#warranties"><strong>All repairs are covered for 24 Months/ 24,000 miles with our nationwide warranty.</strong></a> Home of the complimentary Curry's Car Physical, each visit begins with a thorough inspection so you&rsquo;ll know about the overall health of your car and can make the best, most informed decision about the maintenance of your vehicle. In addition, the <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/services/service-knowledge-center.aspx"><strong>Curry Service Knowledge Center</strong></a> is your exclusive online resource to explore vehicle systems and their maintenance.</p>
<p>Factory trained, ASE Master Technicians perform brake services, tire rotation, wheel alignments, suspension services, AC, routine maintenance and <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/services.aspx">repairs</a>, Certified Virginia Safety &amp; Emissions Inspections, and performance upgrades on all vehicles&mdash;domestic and imported. Starting in August 2013, we&rsquo;ve teamed up with Mr. Tire, so you&rsquo;ll also receive the best tire and wheel fitment, at the guaranteed lowest total price, right here in our shops! This is all summed up as the Curry&rsquo;s Repair Experience.</p>
</div>

<div class="c_DNN6 c_DNN6_Header">
	<div id="dnn_ctr14276_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_14276 --><div id="dnn_ctr14276_ModuleContent" class="DNNModuleContent ModDNNHTMLC">
	<div id="dnn_ctr14276_HtmlModule_lblContent" class="Normal">
	<p>Curry's Auto Service is a pillar of the community. <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/">Curry's Auto Service</a> is a leader in offering name brand tires and wheels for customers located in the Northern Virginia, Maryland, and Washington, DC areas. Our goal is to focus on customer service. It is the foundation of our business. Curry's Auto Service employs a well-trained staff specializing in the sale and installation of passenger car, performance and light truck or SUV tires. Custom wheels are available at Curry's Auto Service. Special wheels and rims complement any tire or customer vehicle. Take this opportunity to browse Curry's Auto Service website or call us for personalized service.</p>
<p>Curry's Auto Service provides quality automotive products and services to customers in <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/alexandria-va.aspx">Alexandria, VA</a>, <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/sterling-va.aspx">Sterling, VA</a>, and <a href="http://www.web21.netdrivenwebs.com/curryva/locations/gaithersburg-md.aspx">Gaithersburg, MD</a>.  Curry's Auto Service is the leading seller in the&nbsp;Northern Virginia, Maryland, and Washington, DC areas&nbsp;for these tire brands MICHELIN&reg; and BFGoodrich&reg; and offers some great discounts on them. Curry's Auto Service also services <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/arlington-va.aspx">Arlington, VA</a>, <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/chantilly-va.aspx">Chantilly, VA</a>, <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/vienna-va.aspx">Vienna, VA</a> and <a href="/locations/leesburg-va.aspx">Leesburg, VA</a> with tire and auto repair services. Curry's Auto Service also offers services in Tires, Auto Repairs and Wheels for the communities of <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/gainesville-va.aspx">Gainesville, VA</a>,&nbsp;<a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/fairfax-va.aspx">Fairfax, VA</a> and <a href="http://www.currysauto.com/locations/falls-church-va.aspx">Falls Church, VA</a>. Give Curry's Auto Service a call at (703) 753-1650 to schedule an appointment today!</p>
</div>

</div><!-- End_Module_14276 --></div>

</div>
